data.message: I want one I love eat sleep and breathe your music surviving a shot is some shit but my heart is righteous and I believe in that same higher power I'm on my 3 rd song for my own EP album representing the D at 34 I don't give a shit sometimes things fall apart so they can fall back together for a reason I swear I police my streets Sterling Heights with that same shit at 34 if we don't believe in something we will fall for anything I got a higher power Isaiah vs death brought me to believe I'm closer to my dream I'm straight Detroit's Finest my CD inspired by the man who saved my life for real I know that feeling but thank you for taking me out of that place you once were in I feel your energy and pain it's like your here I just don't give a shit ride or die and I ain't gettin rolled on you inspired me to finish what I started my music word of mouth is power and you said nothing was impossible for real I never forget where I came from the D and when u make my first platinum gold record that money is going to support the D those mayhems gonna b doing jumping jacks now I found a light from your lead and I ain't never letting this shit go got nothing else but my music and just like you success is my only option believe in you and your music. For real you the illest much love your new shit is tight and your always true to your heart now that's phenominal in my eyes next tattoo next week Detroit's Finest you rock forever in my heart this crazy Shady lady no polar opposite angry blonde is coming xoxox you fine
